text.autoconfig.ruined_equipment.title: Ruined Equipment Config
Enable Set Ruined Items In Hand
When 'true', Ruined items will be set in-hand when they break instead of going into the inventory.
When 'true', repairing Ruined items using the Crafting Grid will be enabled.
When 'true', repairing Ruined items using the Anvil will be enabled.
When 'true', 'Empowering' a Ruined item using the Smithing Table will be enabled.
The Item to be used for applying 'Empowered' to a Ruined item in a Smithing Table.
When 'true', the 'Ruined Equipment' Creative inventory tab will be displayed.
When 'true', Ruined items with Mending held in your hands will be repaired when you collect XP.
